plot: From Earth, the Sun cannot be looked at with human eyes. SUN gives audiences a chance to see the Sun up close in startling high definition.
title: Sun
plot_es: From Earth, the Sun cannot be looked at with human eyes. SUN gives audiences a chance to see the Sun up close in startling high definition.
plot_en: From Earth, the Sun cannot be looked at with human eyes. SUN gives audiences a chance to see the Sun up close in startling high definition.
